Package util.math

package util.math
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    util
     
    util.collection
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Line2D
    Line2D represents a line segment in 2D space defined by two endpoints.
    Point2D
    Point2D represents a point in 2D space with x and y coordinates.
    Point3D
    Point3D represents a point in 3D space, extending Point2D with a z-coordinate.
    Polygon2D
    Polygon2D represents a polygon in 2D space defined by a list of points (vertices).
